author: Marc Caputo
title: Trump campaign takes aim at Biden’s ‘puppeteer’
description: Ron Klain’s sharp criticism of the president’s coronavirus response has put a bulls-eye on his back.
content:
Over the past week, the presidents allies have trained its fire on him, seeking to undermine his credibility and use Klains high-profile role as the face of Bidens coronavirus response to bolster their own arguments about Bidens own competence.
Ron Klain is … [+6248 chars]
